q1: Chelsea is one of those clubs which will disappear as soon as some rich folks will stop throwing money at it.
a1: I think Chelsea will stay around.
q2: There are always rich folks looking to throw money at sports teams, why would Chelsea ever be different?
a2: The club will stay around but they won't be a top club then.
a4: Chelsea were good before they got bought by someone rich. People who say otherwise don't know anything about the club.
q5: What is the Team Captain name?
